name: The Attack of the mutant spiders
name_original: The Attack of the mutant spiders
description:
your trusty gun with the most amazing sound effect.

W/A/S/D to move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to fire

SHIFT to sprint

CTRL to crouch

CREDIT

Made by me and my friend Thomas(his first game jam).

FUTURE UPDATES

Pick ways to upgrade your gun and choose what mutation the spiders will get each round

New map

Animation

Sound

Online co-op
